DepartureLocation.description: Departure details including time and date

ArrivalLocation.description: Arrival details including time and date

Code.description: Status of booking - e.g. Received, Processed, Accepted, Rejected, Requested, Confirmed, Cancelled

Description.description: If no Code provided, status name

DateTime.description: Date and time when the booking status is issued

CarriageStage.description: Carriage stage - e.g. Pre-Carriage, Main-Carriage, On-Carriage

ModeCode.description: Mode of transport code. Refer UNECE Recommendation N. 19 - Code for Modes of Transport,  e.g. 4 - Air transport

TransportIdentifier.description: Airline flight number, or rail /  truck / maritime line id

TransportDate.description: Date associated with TransportIdentifier to uniquely identify the transport line

VehicleRegistration.description: Vehicle identification - e.g. aircraft registration number

VehicleType.description: Vehicle or container type. Refer UNECE28, e.g. 4.00.0 - Aircraft, type unknown

VehicleSize.description: Size of the vehicle - free text

SpaceAllocationDetails.description: Space allocation request / action / confirmation code or details

DeckPosition.description: Position of the shipment in the aircraft - e.g. lower or main deck

ExternalReference.description: Reference to document or logistics object (URI)
